_header: A child is born of a maid
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 3.
_description: A Christmas carol by Richard Smert — two quatrains (abab) and four-line burden: ‘Nascitur ex virgine / sine viri semine’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
A childe ys born of a maydeIn redempcion of vs
                    all…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…To be born of a mayde that ys bryghtThat all mankynde shall
                    noght [be] shent
